title: 6 Simple Steps to Breed Frogs in Minecraft

steps.title: Gather slimeballs.
steps.content: Gather slimeballs. You'll need slime to get frogs to breed. Slimeballs are dropped by slime mobs when slaughtered. You can find slime deep underground or in Swamp biomes. [1] X Research source Frogs were introduced in Minecraft version 1.19 (The Wild). If you haven't updated Minecraft in a while, be sure to update Minecraft to the latest version.

steps.title: Locate frogs.
steps.content: Locate frogs. Frogs spawn in groups of two to five in swamp and mangrove swamp biomes. There are three different color variants for frogs, depending on what biome they are from. Frogs that spawn in temperate biomes are orange. Frogs that spawn in warm biomes are white. Frogs that spawn in cold climates are green. Orange frogs can be found in swamp biomes. White frogs can be found in mangrove swamp biomes. Green frogs do not spawn naturally in the overworld. You will need to breed frogs in a cold biome to produce green frogs.

steps.title: Equip slimeballs.
steps.content: Equip slimeballs. Once you equip slime, frogs will follow you within 6 block spaces. You can get frogs to follow you anywhere, including into Nether portals or End portals.

steps.title: Feed slimeballs to two adult frogs.
steps.content: Feed slimeballs to two adult frogs. You just need to feed one slimeball to each frog. Press the left trigger on game consoles or the right mouse button on PC to feed the frogs slimeballs. This will put the frogs in love mode and cause them to breed. They will lay eggs in the nearest water source. Make sure there is a water source nearby for them to lay eggs in.

steps.title: Wait for the eggs to hatch.
steps.content: Wait for the eggs to hatch. It takes approximately 3 - 6 minutes for the eggs to hatch. When the eggs hatch, they will spawn tadpoles. Make sure there are no axolotls around. They will attack tadpoles, but not frogs. [2] X Research source Tadpoles can be transported using a bucket . The adult frog's color will be determined when they mature into an adult frog. Make sure the tadpoles have plenty of water to swim around in.

steps.title: Wait for the frogs to mature into adults.
steps.content: Wait for the frogs to mature into adults. It takes approximately 20 minutes for tadpoles to turn into adult frogs. You can speed up the process by feeding them slimeballs. [3] X Research source
